description:
Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

translations.description:
Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Verbessert die Unterstützung für StationPlaylist.
Des weiteren fügt es Tastenkombinationen für das Studio aus beliebigen Programmen hinzu.

Verbessert die Unterstützung für StationPlaylist.
Des weiteren fügt es Tastenkombinationen für das Studio aus beliebigen Programmen hinzu.

Mejora el soporte para las aplicaciones de StationPlaylist.
Además, agrega comandos globales para el estudio desde cualquier parte.

Mejora el soporte para las aplicaciones de StationPlaylist.
Además, agrega comandos globales para el estudio desde cualquier parte.

Améliore la prise en charge de StationPlaylist.
En outre, ajoute des commandes globales pour studio où que vous soyez.

Mellora o soporte para as aplicacións de StationPlaylist.
Ademáis, engade ordes globais para o estudio dende calquera parte.

מנגיש את תוכנת StationPlaylist.
בנוסף, מאפשר ביצוע פקודות מכל מקום אחר במחשב.

Poboljšava podršku za StationPlaylist programe.
Također, dodaje globalne naredbama za Studio s bilo kojeg mjesta.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Poprawia dostępność StationPlaylist.
Ponadto, dodaje globalne komendy dla studia, dostępne z każdego miejsca.

Melhora o suporte para aplicativos StationPlaylist.
Além disso, adiciona comandos globais para o Studio em qualquer lugar.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Conține suport pentru StationPlaylist.
De asemenea, adaugă comenzi globale pentru studio de oriunde.

Zlepšuje prístupnosť programu StationPlaylist.
Navyše pridáva globálne skratky, ktoré sa dajú použiť aj mimo hlavného okna SPL.

Poboljšava podršku za StationPlaylist.
Takođe, dodaje globalne komande za studio bilo gde.

Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps.
In addition, adds global commands for the studio from everywhere.

Cải thiện hỗ trợ cho StationPlaylist.
Ngoài ra là thêm các lệnh toàn cục cho studio từ bất cứ đâu.
